urls.title: Who Killed Vincent Chin?
urls.description: In 1982, a Chinese American man named Vincent Chin was beaten to death after his bachelor party by two auto-workers during a time of anti-Asian hate as Japan was blamed for the downturn in the US auto industry

urls.title: So Yun Um Interview – Director of ‘Liquor Store Dreams’
urls.description: “When you're young, you just see so many injustices and you just want to change the world somehow. I thought about how I could use the medium of films to really change people’s opinions.”

urls.title: He Says His Landlord Is Harassing Him to Leave a $450-a-Month Apartment
urls.description: A 77-year-old man has lived in the same building for years. He says in a lawsuit that a neighbor and his landlord are jointly using dubious tactics to push him out.

tweets.text: We are witnessing the largest uprising in China since Tiananmen Square
Tubi has 17 Albert Pyun movies on it
